//: Determines whether the OrchestrationDriver will attempt to build and deploy the other service containers in addition to generating their configuration files and supporting Azure services. Used to enable local development

AzureSubscriptionParams.servicePrincipalClientKey: /*secret key generated from the process in the README.md*/

cosmoDBParams.//: localDBEndpoint is used to configure the various components for a local Cassandra instance, should default false
cosmoDBParams.//2: Default keyspace and table names used in the database, completely arbitrary
